view-application.description: In this section, you can see the status fof your application

upload-document.description: In this section, you can your upload documents.

personal-information.description: In this section, you can see your personal information.

view-my-letters.description: In this section, you can see any letters that were sent for you.

view-my-messages.description: In this section, you can see any messages that were sent to you.

cdcp-alerts.description: In this section, you can subscribe to the email alerts for CDCO, Any time you have a new message, you will be alerted.
